hero.description: I'm passionate about User Experience, Responsive Devlopment, Accessibility and dedicated to my work. Based in Fundão, Portugal.

about.title: About me
about.description: Hi! My name is Bárbara Castilho. I'm a Front-end web developer passionate and dedicated about web development and the creativity that comes out of it, interested in continuous self-developing, looking forward to improve my skills and expanding my knowledge. In my free time time, you can catch me training in a Crossfit Box or reading a book, playing something in a console, or exploring beautiful places in my new home place, Portugal.
